Summary: UFO darted across sky, stopped on a dime, then took off at 90degrees away from me
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Oaks
There were no other sightings in Oaks on or around August 17th 2011
divs: sighting detailslast year i was driving to work early in the morning. i was going in an hour later than usual on this day. the sun was coming up i would say it was sometime last summer, i'm definately going to find out the day now. i'm writing this because i've been telling this story for a year now and someone just asked me if i had googled my story to see if other people saw what i did, and they did.!!! i'm freaking out right now, so back to my story i was driving on 422 in pennsylvania heading towards conshohocken. as i was approaching the "oaks" exit, the sky opens up right there. i noticed a white ball of light in the corner of my eye. i looked over and this thing darted across the sky all the way to my left, so fast, like a shooting stars speed, maybe even faster. the weird thing is, it stopped on a dime. dead stop. hovered for about a second, maybe two, and then shot off towards philly. it was moving so quick it was out of sight before i knew what the hell was even going on. but i definately saw it, when i got to work i told everyone and have been obsessed w\ this phenomenon ever since. like i said, it's been reported over oaks pa before i just wanted to share and say...i saw it too !!!! i thought i was alone but apparently not !!!
